title: [反作弊配置]652AntiCheat - 基于NoCheatPlus的高级反作弊配置
author: Minecraft_652
txt_content:
652AntiCheat 免费的NoCheatPlus配置
增加的功能
更智能的防刷屏
更精准的检测+减少误报增加报错代码,快速查找哪里出错
可以配合基于PNCP的652AntiCheatAddition
完美支持1.8版本基于Bukkit服务端,Spigot,PaperSpigot等      (其他版本应该也支持,没测试而已)
大部分惩罚就是T出,如果有误报可以自行修改必装插件
NoCheatPlus
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/nocheatplus.26/
可装插件
CompatNoCheatPlus
https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/compatnocheatplus-cncp?gameCategorySlug=bukkit-plugins&projectID=40970
PNCP
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/pncp-a-nocheatplus-addition-1-7-10-1-12-support-9000-downloads.37941/
Knockbackplusplus
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/anticheat-knockback.36140/
报错代码注释
0x01 - blockbreak - direction
0x02 - blockbreak - fastbreak
0x03 - blockbreak - frequency
0x04 - blockbreak - noswing
0x05 - blockbreak - reach
0x06 - blockbreak - wrongblock
0x07 - blockinteract - direction
0x08 - blockinteract - reach
0x09 - blockinteract - speed
0x10 - blockinteract - visible
0x11 - blockplace - autosign
0x12 - blockplace - direction
0x13 - blockplace - fastplace
0x14 - blockplace - reach
0x15 - blockplace - noswing
0x16 - blockplace - speed
0x17 - text - frequency
0x18 - text - shortterm
0x47 - text - relog
0x19 - combined - bedleave
0x20 - combined - improbable
0x21 - combined - munchhausen
0x60 - fight - angle
0x22 - fight - critical
0x23 - fight - direction
0x24 - fight - fastheal
0x46 - fight - godmode
0x25 - fight - noswing
0x26 - fight - reach
0x45 - fight - selfhit
0x27 - fight - speed
0x28 - inventory - drop
0x29 - inventory - fastclick
0x30 - inventory - instantbow
0x31 - inventory - instanteat
0x32 - inventory - fastconsume
0x33 - inventory - gutenberg
0x34 - moving
0x35 - morepackets
0x36 - nofall
0x37 - passable
0x38 - survivalfly
0x39 - vehicle - morepackets
0x40 - vehicle - envelope
0x41 - net - attackfrequency
0x42 - net - flyingfrequency - reduceredundant
0x43 - net - keepalivefrequency
0x44 - net - packetfrequency
后续我会汉化这些报错代码信息
如何安装配置?
把附件覆盖掉/plugins/NoCheatPlus/config.yml就OK了












config.yml


2019-4-6 22:05 上传
点击文件名下载附件




26.44 KB, 阅读权限: 30, 下载次数: 162


1.0版本

replies.txt_content: 楼主，1710MOD端用了之后，走路都回弹 跳跃也回弹，回弹非常严重，咋调下配置能解决

replies.author: wby555
replies.txt_content:
这个配置的确很不错，虽然还没有用
用Notepad++看了一下
不错，支持一下
感觉用多好的反外挂插件之类的还是管不住，，，我之前没少弄了反作弊的，但是该有还是有
